item.description:
EVENT: Grab your flashlight and compass, because we're going on a nighttime corn maze adventure!  "Corn-mazing" at Marini Farm in Ipswich is quickly becoming a Mosaic tradition!  Team up with fellow Mosaic members as we go on a wild scavenger hunt though a labyrinth of corn! 

This year's theme is Space Exploration--it will be a BLAST!

Trip Coordinator: Stephanie
RSVP: By Friday, Oct. 12, 7:30 to 10:00
MEET: We'll meet at Marini Farm at 7:30 PM.  Visit www.marinifarm.com for address, directions and additional info.  If you are taking public transit, please contact Stephanie to arrange transportation.
COST: Two Groupon 4-packs have been purchased by the club ($25/4-pack).  If 8 people attend, we will divide the Groupon rate equally.  If more than 8 people attend, we will average the Groupon cost with the actual ticket price to defray costs.  NOTE:  Groupon price includes the corn maze ONLY.  There will be additional costs for other activities (ie, jumping pillow, hayride, etc).  Additional $5 for nonmembers, which can be credited toward a Mosaic membership costing $25.

group.name: Mosaic Jewish Outdoor Club of Massachusetts

item.name: Flashlight Corn Maze Adventure
